game.name: No Way Back: Dark Horizon
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 카메라 움직임 조정, 난이도 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Survive on a mysterious island! Battle against the infected creatures of a failed experiment, gather resources, build your base, and uncover the dark secret of the island.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Survive on a mysterious island! Battle against the infected creatures of a failed experiment, gather resources, build your base, and uncover the dark secret of the island.
